entry.title: Gleam Craft 800 ML Insulated Bottle (Pink & Green) - Set Of Two
entry.summary:
Vendor: Briiton
Type: Bottle
Price: 1758.00

With its minimalist design and elegant curves, it's the perfect complement to any outfit, whether you're hitting the gym, the office, or the streets. Say goodbye to dull hydration and hello to a sleek and sophisticated way to stay refreshed!

1. The product includes set of 2 insulated bottles.
2. The size of each bottle is (3.15x3.15x11.02 inches) or (8x8x28 cm).
3. The capacity of each bottle is 800 ml.
4. The material of each bottle is 304 grade stainless steel.
5. The product is dishwasher safe.
6. The weight of each bottle is 412 gm.
